title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet. The width of the combo box does not match the width of the property sheet column.
EB: I would expect the combo box to always be the same width as the property sheet column. It should work similarly to the DialogCellEditor where the button is always visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Select a cell with a ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Note that the width of the combo box does not match the width of the property sheet column.
